Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high value and importance to you, I propose a special introductory offer. For a limited time, you can acquire this product for $9500. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure an item valued at $10000 at a reduced price. I trust it will meet your expectations and contribute significantly to your needs. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
